Description: Painted pottery reis shabti of a Priest of Amun with a curled lappet-wig tied with a black fillet; a modelled face and one arm held across the chest in relief holding a black whip; the triangular apron is inscribed with black Hieroglyphs; the feet are delineated and the toes are marked.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore (?)
